All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArgumentBuilder<T extends SimpleArgument>
Provides enhanced syntax for the creation of arguments.
ArgumentException
Represents an exception that is thrown when an argument error occurs.
IntegerArgument
Class to represent Integer argument
Manager
The main class of the Command Line Argument Parser organizes other parts.
SimpleArgument
The parent of possible arguments encapsulates common properties and works as a parameterless argument.
StringArgument
Class to represent an argument with a string parameters.
Validator<T>
The interface for the validator of the parameters.
